example.text: Biden's New Regulations on Farmers For those of you who don't know, the Biden Administration issued a new rule that will lead to sweeping changes to the federal government's authority to regulate what is considered a "navigable water." In reality, they're looking to regulate puddles on farms and property owners.
That's why I cosponsored legislation to overturn the WOTUS rule. That legislation passed Congress with bipartisan support - but was vetoed by President Biden earlier this month.
I can confirm that the future of our state is in great hands!! My First Bill: Repeal the NFA Act (HR 450) Three weeks ago, I introduced my first bill in Congress, the Repeal the NFA Act (HR 450) .

My Reaction to the State of the Union Tuesday, I had to sit through Joe Biden's bogus State of the Union speech where all I heard was him doubling down on his failed policies, ignoring our border crisis, and focusing on timeshares and junk fees more than issues that matter. Watch the video below to see my reaction.

For decades, unelected bureaucrats have attempted to use the NFA to impose new regulations on gun owners without Congressional approval. Watch the video below to learn more about my first bill in Congress and why it's so important for law-abiding Americans.

Watch the video below to learn more about my concerns with Ukraine aid and what I'm requesting from the involved agencies.
